data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
St. Truidense's Facundo Colidio has been booked in Mechelen.
In the minute 23, Joachim Van Damme (Mechelen) gets a yellow card.
Seung-Woo Lee for St. Truidense has been booked by Nathan Verboomen and receives a first yellow card.
At AFAS Stadion, Yuma Suzuki has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Nathan Verboomen blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Chris Durkin (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 60, Goal! Aster Vranckx gives Mechelen a 1-0 lead.
Kerim Mrabti with an assist there.
Mechelen take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Aster Vranckx.
In the minute 65, Mory Konate (St. Truidense) has received a yellow card from Nathan Verboomen.
Oleksandr Filippov is replacing Facundo Colidio for the away team.
Aster Vranckx is booked for the home team.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Kerim Mrabti with Nikola Storm. This is the first substitution made today by Wouter Vrancken.
Ibrahima Sory Sankhon (St. Truidense) has received a first yellow card.
Geoffry Hairemans is on a sub for Gustav Engvall for Mechelen.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Seung-Woo Lee with Nelson Balongo.
Kevin Muscat is making the team's third substitution at AFAS Stadion with Samuel Asamoah replacing Chris Durkin.
Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a third substitution, with William Togui replacing Igor De Camargo.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
Thibault Peyre (Mechelen) gets a yellow card.
